Package org.springframework.boot.security.oauth2.server.authorization.autoconfigure.servlet

@NullMarked package org.springframework.boot.security.oauth2.server.authorization.autoconfigure.servlet
Auto-configuration for Spring Security's OAuth2 authorization server.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    OAuth2AuthorizationServerAutoConfiguration
    Auto-configuration for OAuth2 authorization server support.
    OAuth2AuthorizationServerJwtAutoConfiguration
    Auto-configuration for JWT support for endpoints of the OAuth2 authorization server that require it (e.g.
    OAuth2AuthorizationServerProperties
    OAuth 2.0 Authorization Server properties.
    OAuth2AuthorizationServerProperties.Client
    A registered client of the Authorization Server.
    OAuth2AuthorizationServerProperties.Endpoint
    Authorization Server endpoints.
    OAuth2AuthorizationServerProperties.OidcEndpoint
    OpenID Connect 1.0 endpoints.
    OAuth2AuthorizationServerProperties.Registration
    Client registration information.
    OAuth2AuthorizationServerProperties.Token
    Token settings of the registered client.
